text:
OneSignal | San Mateo, CA | FullStack Developer, Senior Fullstack Developer, Solutions Architect | ONSITE | Full-time | https://onesignal.com/careers

OneSignal is a push notification & email platform for mobile apps and websites. Our mission is to democratize access to great messaging tools for all publishers. Over the last three years, weâ€™ve grown to deliver 3.6 billion notifications per day for 220,000 apps and websites.

Our stack includes React+Typescript for our dashboard, Ruby on Rails, Rust (for our delivery system), Spark (for our data projects), and PostgreSQL with 12 first-party mobile SDKs.

Apply Here: Fullstack - https://onesignal.com/careers#P_AAAAAADAAADIozEWXw4FSK

Senior Fullstack - https://onesignal.com/careers#P_AAAAAADAAADDfiNRSH2EuL
